function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variability in governmental policies and public behaviors","Impact":"Inconsistent application of containment measures and public health guidelines, leading to higher risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Standardize and communicate clear guidelines, provide ongoing public education and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, surveillance and monitoring systems","People":"General public, government authorities, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to protective behaviors","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases, higher risk of outbreak escalation","Mitigation":"Provide access to resources for protective behaviors, behavior change interventions, social support systems","Technologies":"Health education materials, mobile health applications, virtual support groups","People":"General public, healthcare providers","Owner":"Health authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Quarantine and isolation measures","Impact":"Psychological distress, socioeconomic disruption, non-compliance with quarantine regulations","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, financial assistance, clear communication of regulations and support services","Technologies":"Telehealth services, online counseling platforms, financial assistance apps","People":"Individuals under quarantine, local communities","Owner":"Mental health professionals, local government agencies"}]}
